forum.content:
別在分手或劈腿傷害了對方後，
才拼命道歉，
那真的很難看，
也讓我想起這首歌的歌詞…


You tell me that you're sorry Didn't think I'd turn around, and say...
你向我表示你的歉意  沒想到我會轉身怒然地說

It's too late to apologize, it's too late
你的道歉太遲了,已經太遲了
I said it's too late to apologize, it's too late
我指責說道歉已太遲,已太遲

urls.description: For the latest Timbaland music, download King Stays King | Available now: bit.ly/KingStaysKingTimbo
urls.title: Timbaland - Apologize ft. OneRepublic

forum.title: Apologize/美國影集Revenge(復仇)插曲
